data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 138,564 cultural Christians in the state of New Ireland to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.location_label: Photo from the state of New Ireland, Papua New Guinea
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 194,100 citizens of the the state of New Ireland.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in New Ireland.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 44,628 believers in the state of New Ireland the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jew, English-speaking people might believe through him.
Lord, please give the 44,628 believers in the state of New Ireland the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in New Ireland, Papua New Guinea to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Spirit, help the church in the state of New Ireland do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

location.name: New Ireland
location.people_groups_list: Oganibi, Iteri, Awun, Ngala, Kara, Wanap
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Oganibi (1,600), Iteri (800), Awun (600), Ngala, Kara (300), Wanap (1,700)
